The loyal health· A court song, to a delicate new tune, called, At the foot of a willow, close under the shade.
1 sheet ([1] p.).
Printed for A. Banks, London: : MDCLXXXII. [1682]
Verse: "Since plotting's a trade ..." A Tory satire. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
